'''Radiant Spincrystal 142''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Idle Hours]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in the [["Flower-Feather Clan"]] Tribe.
